Class RUBTClient

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class RUBTClient
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.awt.event.ActionListener

The GUI for the client. Allows user to view torrent progress, connected peers, etcetera.

Author:
arihayes

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Main method for GUI Creates a JFrame, makes it visible Connects to tracker & peers

Parameters:
args - The run arguments

run

public void run()
Code for a thread which, every 30 seconds, chokes the worse peer and unchokes a random peer. Also removes disconnected peers from the list, and updates the GUI's peer table

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable

writePeerTable

private void writePeerTable()

shutdown

public static void shutdown()
Called during shutdown. Stops the listener and waits for all the peers to disconnect. Informs tracker of download stopping.

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
Called when a button is clicked. Stops/Resumes uploading and downloading.

Specified by:
actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
Parameters:
evt - The click event

log

public static void log(java.lang.String line)
Writes a line to the log. Also writes it to System.out

Parameters:
line - The line String to write

logError

public static void logError(java.lang.String line)
Writes "ERROR:" followed by a line to the log. Also writes it normally to System.err

Parameters:
line - The line String to write
